__**Problem Set 1**__

A function to compute the expected value and standard deviation of an array of values.
```{r}
m <- array(runif(100),dim=c(10,10))
m

expected_value <- function(array){
  sum(array)/(dim(array)*dim(array))
}
expected_value(m)
mean(m)

rows <- dim(m)[1]
cols <- dim(m)[2]

sd_array <- function(array){
  sqrt(var(array))
}

sd_array(m)
sd(m)

#result

```
